title: Frontline Afghanistan: A Tribute to Raffaele Favero (1945-83)
brief_description: A television documentary that pays tribute to Italian born camera operator, Raffaele Favero, who was killed while filming the war in Afghanistan. The film is also a very intimate account of the effect of his death on his wife and children in Australia.
